t: Re: Message to the Destrons

  (OOC: I'm taking it, tha=
t it's a whole new base in a different location.)



  (Mantella gets the m=
essage, listening till the end. She runs to her room in the old Destron Bas=
e, getting a bag, and hanging it on her shoulder. She leaves the base, turn=
ing on a digital map, she heads towards the new home of the Destrons, Sulac=
o.)
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: dachande 
    To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, December 16, 2000 9:54 PM
    Subject: Messa=
ge to the Destrons


    ::Magmatron::

        He sent a comm to all Destr=
on units that were not in the Antartic. The message went as follows: "My De=
strons, my name is Magmatron, you may have heard of me. The mighty Destron =
Base Sulaco is built. I wish for you to join my within. I hope to have a me=
eting for us all, and maybe work out a way for us to win the Beast Wars."
 =
       Only the Destrons could hear it.
